name: Tides of War
description: In every nine standard H3 town, you have oppurtunity to build one dwelling for altenative creature.
author: Mod Design Team (Witchking, Hobbicus, Trith, Sower, Drwal, Khemiel, avatar, Nephretes), fred79, Andruids, Undead Artist, Ragoon, MURArt, Kuririn

1.0.20: Balance changes suggested by pvp community
1.0.16: Trim hero specialty descriptiuons so they fit in preview window
1.0.14: Phantom Ship won't spawn on land in random maps
1.0.13: Fixed possible crash on using creature banks in random maps
1.0.12: Added the creatures' stackExp, fixed the translations and other bugs

chinese.name: 战争之潮（ToW）
chinese.description: 战争之潮（Tides of War）是《英雄无敌 III》的非官方资料片。该模组为每座官方城镇都添加了新的生物，并对英雄特长等内容也进行了一些新的改动。

german.name: Tides of War
german.description: In jeder der neun Standard-H3-Städte gibt es die Möglichkeit, eine Behausung für eine alternative Kreatur zu bauen.

polish.name: Tides of War
polish.description: W każdym z dziewięciu standardowych miast H3 istnieje możliwość zbudowania mieszkania dla alternatywnego stworzenia.

spanish.name: Tides of War
spanish.description: En cada una de las nueve ciudades H3 estándar, tienes la posibilidad de construir un habitáculo extra para criaturas alternativas.
